message: Let's start fair. Take 10%, I'll take the rest.  We can work out a better deal later if you like.
I'll take the majority, but I'm willing to compromise. Your turn to make a better offer!
I'm willing to give up some of my share, but I need a bigger cut than that. Let's split it 70/30 this time. What do you say?
I'll give you a slightly bigger cut, but I'm not going to give up too much. You're getting closer, but I still think I deserve more.
We're getting closer. Let's split it 60/40 this time. It's a fair compromise and will give us both a decent amount. What do you think?

I'm starting to get a little desperate, but I still think I deserve a slightly bigger cut. Let's meet in the middle and split it 50/50. It's a fair compromise, and we can both walk away with a decent amount.
